verses.verse: Cast <WH7971> <WH8761> thy bread <WH3899> upon <WH6440> the waters <WH4325>: for thou shalt find <WH4672> <WH8799> it after many <WH7230> days <WH3117>.
Give <WH5414> <WH8798> a portion <WH2506> to seven <WH7651>, and also to eight <WH8083>; for thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8799> not what evil <WH7451> shall be upon the earth <WH776>.

If the clouds <WH5645> be full <WH4390> <WH8735> of rain <WH1653>, they empty <WH7324> <WH8686> themselves upon the earth <WH776>: and if the tree <WH6086> fall <WH5307> <WH8799> toward the south <WH1864>, or toward the north <WH6828>, in the place <WH4725> where the tree <WH6086> falleth <WH5307> <WH8799>, there it shall be <WH1933> <WH8799>.
He that observeth <WH8104> <WH8802> the wind <WH7307> shall not sow <WH2232> <WH8799>; and he that regardeth <WH7200> <WH8802> the clouds <WH5645> shall not reap <WH7114> <WH8799>.

As thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8802> not what is the way <WH1870> of the spirit <WH7307>, nor how the bones <WH6106> do grow in the womb <WH990> of her that is with child <WH4392>: even so thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8799> not the works <WH4639> of 'Elohim <WH430> who maketh <WH6213> <WH8799> all.

In the morning <WH1242> sow <WH2232> <WH8798> thy seed <WH2233>, and in the evening <WH6153> withhold <WH3240> <WH8686> not thine hand <WH3027>: for thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8802> not whether <WH335> shall prosper <WH3787> <WH8799>, either this or that, or whether they both <WH8147> shall be alike <WH259> good <WH2896>.
Truly the light <WH216> is sweet <WH4966>, and a pleasant <WH2896> thing it is for the eyes <WH5869> to behold <WH7200> <WH8800> the sun <WH8121>:

But if a man <WH120> live <WH2421> <WH8799> many <WH7235> <WH8687> years <WH8141>, and rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> in them all; yet let him remember <WH2142> <WH8799> the days <WH3117> of darkness <WH2822>; for they shall be many <WH7235> <WH8687>. All that cometh <WH935> <WH8804> is vanity <WH1892>.

Rejoice <WH8055> <WH8798>, O young man <WH970>, in thy youth <WH3208>; and let thy heart <WH3820> cheer <WH2895> <WH8686> thee in the days <WH3117> of thy youth <WH979>, and walk <WH1980> <WH8761> in the ways <WH1870> of thine heart <WH3820>, and in the sight <WH4758> of thine eyes <WH5869>: but know <WH3045> <WH8798> thou, that for all these things 'Elohim <WH430> will bring <WH935> <WH8686> thee into judgment <WH4941>.

Therefore remove <WH5493> <WH8685> sorrow <WH3708> from thy heart <WH3820>, and put away <WH5674> <WH8685> evil <WH7451> from thy flesh <WH1320>: for childhood <WH3208> and youth <WH7839> are vanity <WH1892>.
